content: Great post. We all know that once on the curve, you don’t see what is coming and what it’s hiding. Having a company culture and organisation setup to reinvent itself is certainly the most important and probably difficult thing to do. As Steve Jobs said, when the marketing and sales poeple take over a product company, that company ceases to exist in the future. This is what happen to many companies we know or knew. (Blackberry, Kodak, Nokia, Xerox, etc.).
